name: Read VMs from EU West
query:
{
  vms(
    where: {
      internalRegion_IN: [
        "eu-west-1"
        "eu-west-2"
        "westeurope"
        "europe-west1"
        "europe-west2"
        "europe-west3"
        "europe-west4"
        "europe-west6"
        "europe-west8"
        "europe-west9"
        "europe-west12"
      ]
    }
  ) {
    identifier
    accountID
    cloudAccountID
    cloudAccountName
    cloudProvider
    idFromProvider
    internalAssetType
    internalName
    internalRegion
    assetCategory
    contentHash
  }
}
